response.overview: The Hysterical Carnage backyard ultra is set in Loxton, South Australia on the banks of the Murray River.  This film follows 3 runners as they complete continuous 6.71km loops every hour and compete to be the last one standing.  Johan Botha, Holly Ransom and Tamas Lorincz all have a different story to share as they battle this endurance challenge and what mother natures has to throw at them.
response.title: CARNAGE AT HYSTERICAL
